bibl.title: Publius Petronius, Augustan Prefect of Egypt.
bibl.note: Lessing J. Rosenwald Coll. of the Library of Congress (Washington). Fragmentary edict of the prefect Petronius. Sept. 22 B.C. The papyrus shows that the praenomen of P. was Publius, rather than (as is usually thought) Gaius. - I. The papyrus. - II. The date. - III. Petronius and his family.
Bagnall Roger S., Publius Petronius, Augustan Prefect of Egypt.
